    • Constructor Detail

      • Day

        public Day()
        Constructs a day object representing today's date.

      • Day

        public Day(int aDate,
           int aMonth,
           int aYear)
        Constructs a day with a given year, month, and day of the Julian/Gregorian calendar. The Julian calendar is used for all days before October 15, 1582
        Parameters:
        aYear - a year != 0
        aMonth - a month between 1 and 12
        aDate - a date between 1 and 31

      • addDays

        public Day addDays(int n)
        Returns a day that is a certain number of days away from this day.
        Parameters:
        n - the number of days, can be negative
        Returns:
        a day that is n days away from this one

      • daysFrom

        public int daysFrom(Day other)
        Returns the number of days between this day and another day.
        Parameters:
        other - the other day
        Returns:
        the number of days that this day is away from the other (>0 if this day comes later than other)

      • yearsFrom

        public int yearsFrom(Day other)
        Returns the number of years between this day and another day.
        Parameters:
        other - the other day
        Returns:
        the number of days that this day is away from the other (>0 if this day comes later than other)

      • compareTo

        private int compareTo(Day other)
        Compares this day with another day.
        Parameters:
        other - the other day
        Returns:
        a positive number if this day comes after the other day, a negative number if this day comes before the other day, and zero if the days are the same

      • compareYearTo

        private int compareYearTo(Day other)
        Compares this year with another year.
        Parameters:
        other - the other day
        Returns:
        a positive number if this day comes after the other day, a negative number if this day comes before the other day, and zero if the days are the same
